title: PMS 2.0 388 - Sam Darnold Traded To Carolina, NCAA National Championship Preview, & Aaron Rodgers
description: On today's show, Pat and the boys chat about all the craziness that the Final Four produced and look ahead to tonight's Baylor v. Gonzaga National Championship Game, plus they look around the NFL and check in on teams like the Giants, Falcons, Eagles, and others are we quickly approach the NFL Draft. Pat also shares the news of Carson Wentz and TY Hilton having their first throwing session together, and why the results should really excite Colts fans. Joining the program is friend of the show, 2020 NFL MVP, the celebrity host of Jeopardy! for the next two weeks, Green Bay Packers Quarterback, Aaron Rodgers. Pat and Aaron chat about his offseason thus far, what he's been up to, how much he loved getting to be a host of Jeopardy!, and where contract negotiations stand now during the offseason (26:01-49:29). Make sure you subscribe to youtube.com/thepatmcafeeshow and listen every day on Mad Dog Radio, Sirius XM Channel 82. We appreciate you all for listening, come and laugh with us, cheers.
dc:creator: Pat McAfee
